text.p: CIGNA Corp said Tuesday that its indirect wholly owned subsidiary, CHC Acquisition Corp, is extending its offer to purchase all outstanding shares of common stock of Healthsource Inc.
The company said the offer is being extended because certain regulatory approvals have not yet been obtained.

According to IBJ Schroder Bank & Trust Co, the depositary for the offer, as of the close of business on March 31, 10,903,229 shares of Healthsource common stock had been validly tendered. In addition, CIGNA said, Healthsource Chief Executive Norman Payson, beneficial owner of an aggregate of 4,332,760 shares of Healthsource common stock, has previously agreed to tender his shares.
The company said it is extending the offer to buy the shares for $21.75 per share, net to the seller in cash, through April 30.
The offer had been set to expire April 2.
The terms of the extended offer otherwise remain the same as those of the original, the company said.
